thread.title: Eshnaur selected as GAC Offensive Player of the Week
thread.title_full: Eshnaur selected as GAC Offensive Player of the Week

author: ATU Athletic Communications (noreply@couriernews.com)
title: Eshnaur selected as GAC Offensive Player of the Week
text: slideshow On the heels of an outstanding week where the Arkansas Tech Golden Suns volleyball team won a pair of road contests and moved to 7-0 in Great American Conference play, freshman outside hitter Hunter Eshnaur was tabbed as the Great American Conferenceâ€™s Offensive Player of the Week.Eshnaur provided the offensive spark for the Golden Suns as Tech remained perfect in league matches. The freshman averaged 4.29 kills and five points per set against Southeastern Oklahoma and East Central. She posted 20 kills with a .386 hitting percentage, and turned in a 10-dig performance against the Savage Storm. She followed with a 10-kill performance against East Central.Arkansas Tech returns to action this Friday, opening a four-match homestand at Tucker Coliseum with a 6 p.m. match against Southwestern Oklahoma.
